title: Get Security Updates for Android 9 without updating to 10
content:
I am currently using a Pixel (original). I waited a while before updating to android 9, but I don't want to update to android 10 yet (until all the bugs get worked out). How can I make sure I have all the security patches for android 9?

I tried through settings > security > security update, but that took me to the system update to android 10.
I tried through settings > system > system update, but that took me to the system update to android 10 as well.
